facultyName: Faculty of Natural and Mathematical Sciences
description: Our Financial Mathematics MSc enables graduates and professionals with a strong mathematical background to research, develop and apply quantitative and computational techniques to investment and risk management. Based in the Department of Mathematics, this course has a superb reputation for research-led teaching and strong links to industry.
duration: One year FT, two years PT
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
